string-array.name: randremind_release_notes
string-array.item: Re-branded "Donation" to "Pro". All previously free features and many of the new features are free.
Added an app drawer for sub pages.
Added ability to set default reminder settings for every reminder that you create.
Updated the Settings and Help & Feedback pages.
Many additional reminder options (show all by checking "Show Advanced").
Added location based reminders. Add from the "Customizer" page.
Some new features locked to "Pro" version.
Explore the app for additional features. More will be coming soon.
